data.name: Utopia
data.detailed_description:
In UTOPIA, players will spawn with absolutely nothing and have to craft, build and fight for survival against other players, and dangerous NPC’s in an effort to survive.



In the open world players must do whatever they can to SURVIVE. Resources are limited and only the strong will flourish by crafting the weapons and armor you need to dominate. Put your skills to the test against other players, form new squads or take the world on by yourself. UTOPIA is all about forward progression however the player may see fit.

GAME FEATURES



SURVIVAL

UTOPIA supports a beautifully handcrafted survival map to explore on dedicated servers with hundres or in private sessions with up to 10 of your friends!

BASE BUILDING

Build your base or destroy that of your foes. UTOPIA is laced with a robust base building system.

data.short_description: UTOPIA is an open world survival game set in a cute and colorful combat zone. Craft your weapons and build your base! Fight for your life against other players or team up and take everyone down, the choice is yours. Who will you become?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or Later
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad Core or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or Later
  • Processor: i5 3GHz or Ryzen 5 3Ghz
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
